hero.description1: Fullstack Developer with a Mysterious Touch

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate developer with expertise in both front-end and back-end development. Over the years, I've had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects using a range of technologies. I have experience building responsive, user-friendly web applications with modern front-end frameworks such as React, Laravel, and Symfony. On the back-end, I'm comfortable working with languages such as Node.js, PHP, and JavaScript, as well as databases such as MongoDB and MySQL.

Blog.title: Experience at 42 Piscine
Blog.description: I had the opportunity to participate in the intensive coding bootcamp, known as the 'Piscine', at 42 in Paris. During this period, I honed my coding skills, learned to work under pressure, and collaborated with peers on various programming projects. This experience was pivotal in shaping my programming abilities and problem-solving skills.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.name: Name:
contact.thankYou: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
